All America City David Chavana 10K Advisory Board

The All America City David Chavana 10K Advisory Board is to formulate and submit to the City Council plans and recommendations for the operation, development, publicity, and all other matters related to the annual All America City David Chavana 10K race. The Board meets regularly as needed. 315 E. Palm Dr, Edinburg, Tx 78539
Board Members
Yvonne Salinas David Chavana
Angie Rivera Robert Casas
Deanna Sanchez Edward Greaves
Leo Reyes Elias A. Moran Leal
Ricardo Rodriguez, Jr.
Recreation and Parks Board exercise general supervision over the maintenance and equipment of parks, playgrounds, athletic fields, swimming pools and recreation centers and buildings and facilities thereon, and of conducting, directing or causing to be conducted or directed under its supervision a comprehensive program of public recreation activities and services on or in the properties owned or controlled by the city and devoted to park or playground purposes. The Board meets every third Wednesday of the month. 315 E. Mark Peña Dr. Edinburg Tx 78539
Board Members
Alex Rios Louie Alamia
Carlos Arispe Monica Soto
Fernando Delgado Ron Jackson
Gilbert Sanchez Ruben Ramirez Jr.
Javier Salazar

Edinburg Golf Board's duty of the Board is to formulate and submit to the City Council plans and recommendations for the use, operation, maintenance and development of the Ebony Hills Golf Course and Los Lagos Golf Course.

The Board meets regularly every third Monday of the month.

Board Members
Bill Carlson Lauro Guerrero Jr.
Juan L. Garcia David Arispe
Donato Amaya, Jr Vacancy
Ezequiel Moralez

Edinburg Little League shall have full power to adopt bylaws for the regulation of its business and affairs. It shall have the duty of exercising general supervision over a comprehensive program of the Little League baseball and softball recreation activities and services in the city. The Board shall have like powers and duties with reference to other public or privately run Little League chartered programs. The Board meets as needed. 315 E. Mark Peña Dr, Edinburg TX 78539

Board Members
Frankie Salinas Daniel Elizondo
Jose Soto Ruben Vasquez
Benjamin Gonzalez Armando Celedon
Herman Otis Powers III
415 W University Dr. Edinburg, Texas 78539
